SubSections.Title: Metal Manipulation
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Magnetize

Parts: After you hit a metal attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes revealed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Steel Barrage
SubSections.Content: You attack up to 3 combatants within a [Range] meters cone.

SubSections.Title: Steel Wall
SubSections.Content: You summon a wall of metal on a 2 meters wide 6 meters long ray on empty tiles within range.

SubSections.Title: Steel Prison
SubSections.Content: You summon a steel prison on a 6 meters square within range. A combatant is unable to move or be pushed out of or into the prison, but attacks can go through it.

SubSections.Title: Magnetic Interference
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. The effects of all projectiles that move within the area are negated. What this means exactly is up to the GM.

SubSections.Title: Metallic Skin
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes resilient for 2 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Magnetic Stabilization

Parts: Before a willing combatant within range is pushed.

SubSections.Content: It is not pushed instead, and becomes anchored for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Steel Storm
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. At the start of your turns, you attack all combatants within 6 meters of the point. The attacks gain advantage.

SubSections.Title: Artificial Pole

Parts: You hit a combatant with a metal attack.

SubSections.Content: At the start of your turns, you attack all combatants within 4 meters of the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Magnetic Turbulences
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. The area within 8 meters of the point becomes difficult terrain.

SubSections.Title: Magnetic Barrier
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant within range. For all other combatants of your choice, moving into or out of the area within 4 meters of the combatant requires spending an additional 4 meters.

SubSections.Title: Iron Guard
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes protected for 2 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Magnetic Link

Parts: After you hit a metal attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: For 1 round, the combatant becomes unable to move or teleport away from you.

SubSections.Title: Vine Strike
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within reach.

SubSections.Title: Entangling Roots

Parts: After you hit a plants attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes grappled.

SubSections.Title: Animate Plant
SubSections.Content: You summon a plant at an empty point within range.

SubSections.Title: Thorned Growth
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. After 1 round, whenever a combatant first (per round) moves out of a point within 8 meters of the chosen point, you strike the combatant. The area is difficult terrain.

SubSections.Title: Poisonous Spores

Parts: After you hit a plants attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes poisoned for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Wall of Thorns
SubSections.Content: You summon a wall of thick, thorny plants on a 2 meters wide and 6 meters long ray on empty points within range. Whenever a combatant ends its turn close to the wall, you strike it.

SubSections.Title: Blooming Vitality
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes regenerating for 2 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Thorned Armor
SubSections.Content: Choose a willing combatant within range. After whenever the combatant is hit, you strike the attacker.

SubSections.Title: Nasty Thorns

Parts: After you hit a plants attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant gains 3 bleeding stacks, or 5 on a crit.

SubSections.Title: Wooden Cocoon
SubSections.Content: You become protected 2 until you move.

SubSections.Title: Sleeping Odor
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. All combatants become collapsed while within 6 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Rotten Odor
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. Whenever a combatant ends its turn within 6 meters of the point, it gains 1 rotting stack.

SubSections.Title: Animate Massive Plant
SubSections.Content: After 2 rounds, you summon a plant at an empty point within range.

SubSections.Title: Thorn Burst
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within a [Range] meters cone.

SubSections.Title: Overgrowth Surge
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. After 2 rounds, you attack all combatants within 8 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Toxic Splash
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Noxious Grasp
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within reach.

SubSections.Title: Poisonous Substance

Parts: After you hit a poison attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes poisoned for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Corpse Poison
SubSections.Content: All combatants within 2 meters become poisoned 3 for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Corrupting Mist
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. All combatants become hopeless while within 6 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Poisonous Blood
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you gain poisoned immunity and metabolism resistance.

SubSections.Title: Toxic Smell
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, all combatants become poisoned while within reach.

SubSections.Title: Lethal Poison

Parts: You hit a combatant with a poison attack.

SubSections.Content: At the start of your turns, you attack the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Lethal Venom

Parts: You hit a combatant with a poison attack.

SubSections.Content: At the start of your turns, you attack the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Nerve Poison

Parts: After you hit a poison attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes paralyzed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Miasma

Parts: After you hit a poison attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes diseased for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Knockout Poison

Parts: After you hit a poison attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes collapsed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Poisonous Fumes
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within a [Range] meters cone.

SubSections.Title: Venomous Needles
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within a 6 meters cone.

SubSections.Title: Medicinal Poison
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range gains poisoned and diseased immunity for 2 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Shadow Blade
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within reach.

SubSections.Title: Sever Shadow

Parts: After you hit a shadow attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes collapsed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Shadow Jump
SubSections.Content: You teleport to a point within [Speed] meters that is close to a wall, an object or a combatant.

SubSections.Title: Remnant Shadow
SubSections.Content: You summon a remnant shadow at your original location. A combatant with low intelligence is unable to notice the difference between you and the shadow (at GM's discretion). You can use a quick action to swap location with your shadow via teleportation.

SubSections.Title: Remote Attack

Parts: Before you use a shadow ability.

SubSections.Content: You use the ability from your shadow's location instead.

SubSections.Title: Shadow Clone
SubSections.Content: You summon a shadow clone at an empty point within range. The clone has learned all of your techniques, has the same base stats as you (affected are power, speed, evasion, accuracy, range, graze range, crit range, size, reach), and has the same weapons equipped as you.

SubSections.Title: Shadow Swap
SubSections.Content: You swap location (via teleportation) with a willing combatant within range that has been on the battlefield for at least 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Cloak Of Darkness
SubSections.Content: You become hidden until you use an action.

SubSections.Title: Shadow Rift
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant within range. After 1 round, you teleport to an empty point close to the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Shadow Veil
SubSections.Content: You become protected 2 for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Dark Pulse
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within reach.

SubSections.Title: True Dark Pulse
SubSections.Content: After 2 rounds, you attack all combatants within 6 meters. You gain advantage on the attack.

SubSections.Title: Reality Slash
SubSections.Content: You strike a target within range.

SubSections.Title: Teleport
SubSections.Content: You teleport to an empty point within range.

SubSections.Title: Arcane Missiles
SubSections.Content: You strike up to 3 combatants within range.

SubSections.Title: Void Step

Parts: You hit a combatant within reach.

SubSections.Content: You teleport to an empty point close to it.

SubSections.Title: Living Rift

Parts: You hit a combatant within range.

SubSections.Content: After 1 round, you teleport to an empty point close to it.

SubSections.Title: Black Hole
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. After a startup of 1 round, whenever a combatant first (per round) is within 2 meters of the point, you strike it. The area counts as difficult terrain while moving away from its center. The radius expands by 4 meters at the end of your every turn. If it would expand beyond 16 meters, it is destroyed instead.

SubSections.Title: Gravity Binding

Parts: After you hit a space attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes slowed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Gravity Field
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. All combatants become slowed while within 6 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Spatial Seal
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. All combatants become soulbound while within 6 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Swap
SubSections.Content: You swap location (via teleportation) with a willing combatant within range that has been on the battlefield for at least 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Grand Teleportion
SubSections.Content: After 1 round, all combatants within 4 meters teleport to a point within range with an empty area within 4 meters of it.

SubSections.Title: Void Implosion
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. After 1 round, you strike all combatants within 6 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Spatial Stasis

Parts: After you hit a space attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes grappled.

SubSections.Title: Water Cannon
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Water Pressure

Parts: After you hit a water attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: You push the combatant 2 meters away from you.

SubSections.Title: Water Ray
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within a 2 meters wide ray from you to a point within range.

SubSections.Title: Wave
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants of your choice within range.

SubSections.Title: Tidal Surge
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within a 6 meters wide ray from you to a point within range.

SubSections.Title: Healing Bubble
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes regenerating for 2 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Cleanse
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range loses a simple unstackable condition of your choice.

SubSections.Title: Drench
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range stops being aflame and gains immunity against the condition for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Aqua Jet
SubSections.Content: You are pushed [Speed] meters into a direction of your choice.

SubSections.Title: Moon Tide
SubSections.Content: After 3 rounds, you strike all combatants of your choice within range.

SubSections.Title: Hyper Water Ray
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. After 1 round, whenever a combatant first (per round) is within a 2 meters wide ray from you to the point, you strike it. If your location changes, this ability ends.

SubSections.Title: Splash

Parts: After a combatant within range hits.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes confused for the attack.

SubSections.Title: Water Armor
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes regenerating for 2 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Wind Slash
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Gust

Parts: After you hit a wind attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: You push the combatant 2 meters away from you.

SubSections.Title: Cyclone
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. After 1 round, whenever a combatant first (per round) is exactly 4 meters away from the point, you strike it. On a hit, it is pushed outside of the area and becomes prone.

SubSections.Title: Vortex Blade
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within a [Range] meters cone.

SubSections.Title: Air Barrier
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, the effects of all projectiles that come close to you are negated. What this means exactly is up to the GM.

SubSections.Title: Gale Force

Parts: Before you make a ranged wind attack.

SubSections.Content: The range of the attack is increased by 30 meters.

SubSections.Title: Backwind
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes hastened for 2 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Sudden Breeze

Parts: After a combatant within range hits a ranged attack.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes confused 2 for the attack.

SubSections.Title: Whirling Winds
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants that are exactly [Range] meters away from you.

SubSections.Title: Hurricane
SubSections.Content: At the start of your turns, you strike all combatants that are exactly [Range] meters away from you.

SubSections.Title: Whispering Wind
SubSections.Content: You become keen for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Block Sound
SubSections.Content: You become focused for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Wind Carry
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range gains slowed immunity for 2 rounds.
